5A1F4B4A.Line1.6D03F: Forgive my familiarity as I write. Harsh words better tell the tale of hard times.

631D2AF9.VoiceDir3.6D03F: A little more optimistic then Lorath usually is--this is written decades ago.

8E083E4E.Line5.6D03F: The rebirth of the Horadric Order is up to the few of us who remain.

F413C4CC.Line3.6D03F: Maybe the end of those times nears. Our leader, the archangel Tyrael, led us to this vault before setting off on a task of his own. Heâ€™s entrusted me to lead in his place.
